name: n8n
semantic_context: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance
natural_language_description: 这是 n8n 节点。主要用于: Handle events and perform actions on your n8n instance

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: workflow

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

additionalOptions.name: additionalOptions
additionalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: categories (值: None) - Risk categories to include in the audit
daysAbandonedWorkflow (值: None) - Days for a workflow to be considered abandoned if not executed

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the new credential | (必填项)

credentialTypeName.name: credentialTypeName
credentialTypeName.description: The available types depend on nodes installed on the n8n instance. Some built-in types include e.g. 'githubApi', 'notionApi', and 'slackApi'.
credentialTypeName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Credential Type | 作用: The available types depend on nodes installed on the n8n instance. Some built-in types include e.g. 'githubApi', 'notionApi', and 'slackApi'. | (必填项)

data.name: data
data.description: A valid JSON object with properties required for this Credential Type. To see the expected format, you can use 'Get Schema' operation.
data.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data | 作用: A valid JSON object with properties required for this Credential Type. To see the expected format, you can use 'Get Schema' operation. | (必填项)

credentialId.name: credentialId
credentialId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Credential ID | (必填项)

executionId.name: executionId
executionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Execution ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: True

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: tags (值: None) - Include only workflows with these tags
excludePinnedData (值: None) - Whether to exclude pinned data from the response

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: activeWorkflows (值: None) - Whether to include the detailed execution data

workflowId.name: workflowId
workflowId.description: Workflow to filter the executions by
workflowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow | 作用: Workflow to filter the executions by | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: versionId (值: None) - The version ID of the workflow to publish
name (值: None) - Published version name (will be overwritten)
description (值: None) - Published version description (will be overwritten)

workflowObject.name: workflowObject
workflowObject.description: A valid JSON object with required fields: 'name', 'nodes', 'connections' and 'settings'. More information can be found in the documentation.
workflowObject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workflow Object | 作用: A valid JSON object with required fields: 'name', 'nodes', 'connections' and 'settings'. More information can be found in the documentation. | (必填项)

versionId.name: versionId
versionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Version ID | 作用: The version ID to retrieve | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
